title: This Website
description: I hope it doesn't come as too much of a shock when I say that the website you are looking at right now was designed by... me. It's hosted on GitHub Pages as a place to showcase my past and present projects for anyone who's interested, including potential employers (like yourself ðŸ˜‰). Because GitHub Pages doesn't support PHP or SQL, dynamic content is loaded using AJAX to read JSON files hosted on GitHub.
